description: Commands to manage resources from Microsoft.KubernetesConfiguration.

commands.name: az k8s-configuration delete
commands.summary: Delete a Flux v1 Kubernetes configuration (This command is for Flux v1, to use the newer Flux v2, run "az k8s-configuration flux delete").
examples:
az k8s-configuration delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --cluster-name MyClusterName \
--cluster-type connectedClusters --name MyConfigurationName

commands.name: az k8s-configuration list
commands.summary: List Flux v1 Kubernetes configurations (This command is for Flux v1, to use the newer Flux v2, run "az k8s-configuration flux list").
examples:
az k8s-configuration list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --cluster-name MyClusterName \
--cluster-type connectedClusters

commands.name: az k8s-configuration show
commands.summary: Show details of a Flux v1 Kubernetes configuration (This command is for Flux v1, to use the newer Flux v2, run "az k8s-configuration flux show").
examples:
az k8s-configuration show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --cluster-name MyClusterName \
--cluster-type connectedClusters --name MyConfigurationName
